titleStmt.title: Pious remarkes upon the life of S. Joseph spouse of the B. Virgin Mary mother of our Lord Jesus Christ. Written originally in French by Rd. father Paul Barrie
titleStmt.author: Barry, Paul de, 1587-1661.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition of the English translation.

notesStmt.note: "Devotions to S. Joseph spouse" has separate dated title page; with separate pagination and register.
